parameters.query:
INSERT INTO ErrorLogs
(ErrorLogId, WorkflowName, NodeName, ErrorMessage, ErrorDetails, OccurredDate, IsResolved, WorkflowId, StackTrace, Mode, ExecutionId)
OUTPUT INSERTED.ErrorLogId
VALUES
(
  NEWID(),
  '{{ $('Normalize Data').item.json.workflowNameSanitized }}',
  '{{ $('Normalize Data').item.json.lastNodeExecutedSanitized }}',
  '{{ $('Normalize Data').item.json.errorMessageSanitized }}',
  NULL,
  '{{ $('Date Normalization').item.json['Date ISO'] }}',
  0,
  NULL,
  '{{ $('Normalize Data').item.json.errorStackSanitized }}',
  '{{ $('Normalize Data').item.json.executionMode }}',
  '{{ $('Normalize Data').item.json.executionId }}'
)
